text: Raymond Park (born 23 August 1974) is a Scottish actor, author and martial artist. He is best known for playing Darth Maul in Star Wars: Episode I â€“ The Phantom Menace and Solo: A Star Wars Story. He also played Toad in X-Men and Snake-Eyes in G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra and G.I.
